title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Reinforcement Learning-Based Personalized Cancer Treatment Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the decision-making processes of reinforcement learning models using clinical data
Analyze case studies demonstrating how Q-learning-based algorithms are applied to personalized cancer treatment

Within one week, learners implement treatment strategy simulations for three medical scenarios using mobile tools (e.g., MIT App Inventor) in limited-tech environments (Android Go, low-spec tablets), submitting deliverables that meet ≥4/5 rubric criteria (e.g., functionality, realism, usability).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
